Ryan Hamilton is Professor of Marketing at Emory University's Goizueta Business School in Atlanta, Georgia. He is the co-host of 'The Intuitive Customer' ...
Ryan Hamilton is Associate Professor of Marketing at Emory University's Goizueta Business School. He received his PhD in Marketing from Northwestern University.
